> Hydras continue tracking Cyclonus and the others

As Hydras approached he got finally into visual range of it, and he
could see that it was in truth a battle. Cyclonus' striking form is
standing in the middle of it, his weapons lashing out. Even though he
seemed to firing rapidly in several different directions it is obvious
that he is being careful not to hit anything that would bring the
tunnel down on top of them.

What Cyclonus is fighting was strange. It looked like some sort of
insect like creature, like a cross between a spider and a Mantis. It
had 10 legs, 6 for walking and 4 that ended in long sharp mantis like
claws. However instead of a living chitinous shell, it was encased in
yellow, red and orange armor, which looked disturbingly similar to
Rodimus' armor style. They were rocket launchers and laser cannons
sitting on their frames, showing that they were definitely designed
for war!

Fortunately there was only one left, but there were several others
just like it laying on the ground, as was Bruticus-X, Insecticon and
Scourge. Cyclonus himself looked heavily damaged as he battled on, the
look on his face said he was resigned to whatever fate this battle had
in store for him.

"We are the horde." the creature said as it raised its arms at
Cyclonus, its claws out, "You cannot resist us. You will become one
with us, your technological distinctiveness with strengthen the hive."

"You are not warrior, you are slaves to a beast! I shall give you what
you do not deserve, a warrior's death!" With that he fired, causing
the creature to back up a step and then the fighting continued.

*     *     *    *

"What is that Lord Sire?" Inferno whispered to Hydras they crept up
beside Hydras as they all could now see and hear what was going on.

Iguanus grunted slightly as he readied his weapon, "There's only one,
it shouldn't be too hard."

Fractyl said nothing as he hung to the rear, not all that comfortable
with battle, but still ready to carry out Hydras' orders. But even he
thought Iguanus was too sure of himself. If it was tough for Cyclonus,
the creature had to be pretty strong.

(TAG)

Preston
